template.name: Random Tracks for Custom Tags
template.description: Random tracks for custom tags with specified values

parameter.name: Playlist name
parameter.placeholdervalue: Enter a name for your dynamic playlist

parameter.name: Never stop
parameter.tooltipvalue: When all matching tracks have been played, the history and cache are deleted so that these tracks can be played again. You will end up with a dynamic playlist that will not stop playing as long as tracks are found that match the search criteria.

parameter.name: Include custom tag 1
parameter.data: select id,attr,attr from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' group by attr order by attr asc
lt=Less than,le=Less than or equal to,ge=Greater than or equal to,gt=Greater than,eq=Equal to (single value),contains=Contains (string),oneof=Equal to one of multiple values,hasvalue=Has a value

parameter.name: Custom tag 1 values
parameter.placeholdervalue: case sensitive + use semicolon to separate multiple strings

parameter.name: Include custom tag 2
parameter.data: select id,attr,attr from customtagimporter_track_attributes where type='customtag' group by attr order by attr asc
